senderCallsign.title: Sender Callsign
senderCallsign.description: Specifies the sending callsign of interest

receiverCallsign.title: Receiver Callsign
receiverCallsign.description: Specifies the receiving callsign of interest

callsign.title: Callsign
callsign.description: Specifies the callsign of interest. Specify only one of senderCallsign, receiverCallsign, callsign

flowStartSeconds.title: Flow Start Seconds
flowStartSeconds.description: A negative number of seconds to indicate how much data to retrieve. This cannot be more than 24 hours.

rptlimit.title: Report Limit
rptlimit.description: Limit the number of records returned.

rronly.title: Reception Reports Only
rronly.description: Only return the reception report records if non zero.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: The mode of the signal that was detected.

noactive.title: Reception Reports Only
noactive.description: Do not return the active monitors if non zero.

frange.title: Mode
frange.description: A lower and upper limit of frequency. E.g. 14000000-14100000.

nolocator.title: No Locator
nolocator.description: If non zero, then include reception reports that do not include a locator.

callback.title: Callback
callback.description: Causes the returned document to be javascript, and it will invoke the function named in the callback.

modify.title: Modify
modify.description: If this has the value 'grid' then the callsign are interpreted as grid squares.

lastseqno.title: Last Sequence Number
lastseqno.description: Limits search to records with a sequence number greater than or equal to this parameter. The last sequence number in the database is returned on each response.

appcontact.title: App Contact Email
appcontact.description: Email address for PSKReporter to contact if there is an issue.

queryResponse.title: PSKReporter Raw XML Query Response
queryResponse.description: Raw PSKReporter Query Response XML string

queryResponse.title: PSKReporter Query Response
queryResponse.description: Raw PSKReporter Query Response decoded from XML

receptionReports.title: Reception Reports Data
receptionReports.description: All raw data parsed from PSKReporter XML response

receptionReportsData.title: Reception Reports Data
receptionReportsData.description: Top level data structure for all reception report data from a query

currentSeconds.title: Current Seconds
currentSeconds.description: The current seconds value of the query

lastSequenceNumber.title: Last Sequence Number Object
lastSequenceNumber.description: Contains last sequence number of query results

value.title: Last Sequence Number Value
value.description: The value of the last sequence number

maxFlowStartSeconds.title: Max Flow Start Seconds Object
maxFlowStartSeconds.description: Contains last max flow start seconds of query results

value.title: Max Flow Start Seconds
value.description: The value of the max flow start seconds

activeReceiver.title: Active Receiver
activeReceiver.description: Data about one active receiver from the query results

locator.title: Locator
locator.description: The maidenhead locator of the receiver

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of the receiver in Hertz

region.title: Region
region.description: The region in the DXCC entity of the sender

DXCC.title: DXCC
DXCC.description: The DXCC entity of the receiver

decoderSoftware.title: Decoder Software
decoderSoftware.description: The decoder software used by the receiver

antennaInformation.title: Antenna Information
antennaInformation.description: The antenna information for the receiver

receptionReport.title: Reception Report
receptionReport.description: Data about one reception report from the query results

receiverLocator.title: Receiver Locator
receiverLocator.description: The maidenhead locator of the receiver

senderLocator.title: Sender Locator
senderLocator.description: The maidenhead locator of the sender

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of the receiver in Hertz

senderDXCC.title: Sender DXCC
senderDXCC.description: The DXCC entity of the sender

senderDXCCCode.title: Sender DXCC Code
senderDXCCCode.description: The DXCC code of the sender

senderDXCCLocator.title: Sender DXCC Locator
senderDXCCLocator.description: The maidenhead locator of the sender DXCC entity

sNR.title: sNR
sNR.description: Signal to Noise ratio in decibels

activeCallsign.title: Active Callsign
activeCallsign.description: Data about one active callsign from the query results

reports.title: reports
reports.description: The number of reports for this callsign

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of the callsign in Hertz

queryResponse.title: PSKReporter Response
queryResponse.description: PSKReporter Query Response decoded for use in Application

maxFlowStartSeconds.title: Max Flow Start Seconds
maxFlowStartSeconds.description: The max flow start seconds value

locator.title: Locator
locator.description: The maidenhead locator of the receiver

receptionReport.description: Data about one reception report from the query results

receiverLocator.description: The maidenhead locator of the receiver

senderDXCCCode.description: The DXCC code of the sender

senderDXCCLocator.title: Sender DXCC Locator
senderDXCCLocator.description: The maidenhead locator of the sender DXCC entity

sNRString.description: Signal to Noise ratio in decibels - as reported
